actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 906, title 38, United States Code, to provide in lieu of a government marker, payment not exceeding $100 toward the purchase price of a monument or marker.

summary.text: Provides for up to $100 to be paid towards the cost of a veteran's monument or marker in lieu of a Government marker or headstone.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 906, title 38, United States Code, to provide in lieu of a government marker, payment not exceeding $100 toward the purchase price of a monument or marker.
